entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 5:51 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:51 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
